car_accidents.name: Motor vehicle collisions
car_accidents.category: Public Safety, Emergency Services and Justice
car_accidents.description: The Motor Vehicle Collisions data tables contain information from all police reported motor vehicle collisions in NYC. The police report (MV104-AN) is required to be filled out for collisions where someone is injured or killed, or where there is at least $1000 worth of damage
